stdout:
Table	Create Table
data_collections	CREATE TABLE `data_collections` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `app_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `display_name` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `schema` json NOT NULL,
  `indexes` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `permissions` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `hooks` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '1',
  `created_by` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `fields` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `read_perm` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'public',
  `create_perm` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'authenticated',
  `update_perm` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'creator',
  `delete_perm` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'admin',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `idx_app_id` (`app_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uk_app_name` (`app_id`,`name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
